title: Gothic 2 - Golden Edition
description:
Readme!
1: Burn or mount with Daemon tools
2: Install Night of the raven (cd4)
3: When it&#039;s done copy the crack Ar.exe and Gothic2.exe from the crack folder not in the CD 1 cause
that crack don&#039;t work.Copy the crack to C:programJoWooDgothic IIsystem.
4: As the game SHOULD start now, but the dialogue sound and text will disappear, you will have to change the 
file endings of two files: Go into C:programjJoWooDGothic IIworkDataScriptsContentCutscene and rename OU.DAT to OU.BIN and OU.lsc to OU.csl.
5: Now the game is 100% on english but when you start from the deskop or game folder you got a loading screen on Germany but don&#039;t worry about that.
6: Seed after download so other can download this i gonna seed for a while
